statements: UPDATE lead_engagement SET interaction_type='Meeting', preference_1='Email' WHERE lead_id=123;
UPDATE lead_engagement SET preference_1='Phone Call', preference_2='SMS', interaction_date='2022-08-15' WHERE lead_id=456;
UPDATE lead_engagement SET preference_1 = 'Updated Preference 1', interaction_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE lead_id = 100
UPDATE lead_engagement SET preference_2 = 'New Preference 2', lead_name = 'John Doe', interaction_type = 'Email' WHERE lead_id = 200
UPDATE engagements SET interaction_type='like', interaction_time='2022-10-12 08:30:00' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE preferences SET preference_1=TRUE, last_name='Doe', email_address='john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE engagements SET interaction_type = 'Email', interaction_details = 'Sent an email to user' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE preferences SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe', email_address = 'john.doe@example.com', preference_1 = true WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE past_interactions SET interaction_type='Meeting', interaction_result='Positive' WHERE interaction_id=1;
UPDATE lead_preferences SET preferred_product='Software', last_interaction_date='2022-01-15' WHERE lead_id=12;
UPDATE past_interactions SET interaction_type = 'Meeting', interaction_result = 'Successful' WHERE lead_id = 12345 AND interaction_date = '2022-01-15';
UPDATE lead_preferences SET preferred_product = 'Gadgets', last_interaction_date = '2022-02-20', preferred_channel = 'Email' WHERE lead_id = 54321;
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_date = '2022-05-15 08:30:00', outcome = 'Positive' WHERE interaction_id = 123;

UPDATE interactions SET outcome = 'Positive' WHERE interaction_id = 123
UPDATE lead_preferences SET preference_1 = 'Option A', preference_2 = 'Option B' WHERE lead_id = 456
UPDATE leads SET email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE lead_id = 12345;
UPDATE preferences SET preference_details = 'New preference details' WHERE lead_id = 54321 AND preference_type = 'Marketing';
UPDATE interactions SET outcome = 'Successful' WHERE lead_id = 123;
UPDATE leads SET email = 'newemail@example.com', phone_number = '9876543210' WHERE lead_id = 456;
